description: | What does this do? | Configures the Windows LAN Manager Authentication Level to require NTLMv2. | | Why should you use this? | This is recommended by Microsoft to prevent the use of insecure protocols. | | What is the end-user impact? | High Impact. Windows file sharing will not work with any devices that do not support NTLMv2. | | Learn more | [Network security: LAN Manager authentication level](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/threat-protection/security-policy-settings/network-security-lan-manager-authentication-level) |
